## Quick Links

### R Programming
- [Tidyverse](https://www.tidyverse.org/) - Collection of R packages for data science
- [R for Data Science](https://r4ds.had.co.nz/) - Free online book
- [RStudio Cheatsheets](https://www.rstudio.com/resources/cheatsheets/) - Quick reference guides

### Python Data Science
- [Python Data Science Handbook](https://jakevdp.github.io/PythonDataScienceHandbook/) - Free online book
- [Pandas Documentation](https://pandas.pydata.org/docs/) - Data manipulation library
- [Scikit-learn](https://scikit-learn.org/) - Machine learning in Python

### Pharma & Clinical Trials
- [R/Pharma](https://rinpharma.com/) - R in Pharmaceutical Industry
- [CDISC](https://www.cdisc.org/) - Clinical Data Interchange Standards
- [ICH Guidelines](https://www.ich.org/page/ich-guidelines) - International Council for Harmonisation

### Visualization
- [ggplot2](https://ggplot2.tidyverse.org/) - Grammar of graphics for R
- [Plotly](https://plotly.com/) - Interactive visualizations
- [Shiny](https://shiny.rstudio.com/) - Web applications with R
